roles.name: Dynamics 365 administrator
roles.description: Can manage all aspects of the Dynamics 365 product.

roles.name: Exchange administrator
roles.description: Can manage all aspects of the Exchange product.

roles.name: Exchange recipient administrator
roles.description: Can manage all aspects of the Exchange product.

roles.name: Identity governance administrator
roles.description: Manage access using Azure AD for identity governance scenarios.

roles.name: Knowledge administrator
roles.description: Can configure knowledge, learning, and other intelligent features.

roles.name: Knowledge manager
roles.description: Can organize, create, manage, and promote topics and knowledge.

roles.name: Windows update deployment administrator
roles.description: Create and manage all aspects of Windows Update deployments through the Windows Update for Business deployment service.

roles.name: Cloud app security administrator
roles.description: Can manage all aspects of the Cloud App Security product.

roles.name: Groups administrator
roles.description: Can manage all aspects of groups and group settings like naming and expiration policies.

roles.name: Power BI administrator
roles.description: Can manage all aspects of the Power BI product.

roles.name: Teams administrator
roles.description: Can manage the Microsoft Teams service.

roles.name: Teams communications administrator
roles.description: Can manage calling and meetings features within the Microsoft Teams service.

roles.name: Teams devices administrator
roles.description: Can perform management related tasks on Teams certified devices.

roles.name: Insights administrator
roles.description: Has administrative access in the Insights app.

roles.name: Insights business leader
roles.description: Can view and share dashboards and insights via the M365 Insights app.

roles.name: Kaizala administrator
roles.description: Can manage settings for Microsoft Kaizala.

roles.name: Network administrator
roles.description: Can manage network locations and review enterprise network design insights for Microsoft 365 Software as a Service applications.

roles.name: Office apps administrator
roles.description: Can manage Office apps cloud services, including policy and settings management, and manage the ability to select, unselect and publish "what's new" feature content to end-user's devices.

roles.name: Power platform administrator
roles.description: Can create and manage all aspects of Microsoft Dynamics 365, PowerApps, and Microsoft Flows.

roles.name: Search administrator
roles.description: Can create and manage all aspects of Microsoft Search settings.

roles.name: Search editor
roles.description: Can create and manage the editorial content such as bookmarks, Q and As, locations, floorplan.

roles.name: SharePoint administrator
roles.description: Can manage all aspects of the SharePoint service.

roles.name: Skype for Business administrator
roles.description: Can manage all aspects of the Skype for Business product.

roles.name: Teams communications support engineer
roles.description: Can troubleshoot communications issues within Teams using advanced tools.

roles.name: Teams communications support specialist
roles.description: Can troubleshoot communications issues within Teams using basic tools.

roles.name: Azure DevOps administrator
roles.description: Can manage Azure DevOps organization policy and settings.

roles.name: External Id user flow administrator
roles.description: Can create and manage all aspects of user flows.

roles.name: External Id user flow attribute administrator
roles.description: Can create and manage the attribute schema available to all user flows.

roles.name: Intune administrator
roles.description: Can manage all aspects of the Intune product.

roles.name: Cloud device administrator
roles.description: Full access to manage devices in Azure AD.

roles.name: Desktop analytics administrator
roles.description: Can access and manage Desktop management tools and services.

roles.name: Printer administrator
roles.description: Can manage all aspects of printers and printer connectors.

roles.name: Printer technician
roles.description: Can register and unregister printers and update printer status.

roles.name: Azure AD joined device local administrator
roles.description: Users assigned to this role are added to the local administrators group on Azure AD-joined devices.

roles.name: Global administrator
roles.description: Can manage all aspects of Azure AD and Microsoft services that use Azure AD identities. Do not select this role unless absolutely necessary.

roles.name: Windows 365 administrator
roles.description: Users with this role have global permissions on Windows 365 resources, when the service is present. Additionally, this role contains the ability to manage users and devices in order to associate policy, as well as create and manage groups.

roles.name: Authentication administrator
roles.description: Has access to view, set, and reset authentication method information for any non-admin user.

roles.name: Conditional access administrator
roles.description: Can manage conditional access capabilities.

roles.name: Helpdesk administrator
roles.description: Can reset passwords for non-administrators and Helpdesk administrators.

roles.name: License administrator
roles.description: Ability to assign, remove and update license assignments.

roles.name: Password administrator
roles.description: Can reset passwords for non-administrators and Password administrators.

roles.name: Privileged authentication administrator
roles.description: Allowed to view, set and reset authentication method information for any user (admin or non-admin).

roles.name: Privileged role administrator
roles.description: Can manage role assignments in Azure AD, and all aspects of Privileged Identity Management.

roles.name: User administrator
roles.description: Can manage all aspects of users and groups, including resetting passwords for limited admins.

roles.name: Application administrator
roles.description: Can create and manage all aspects of app registrations and enterprise apps.

roles.name: Application developer
roles.description: Can create application registrations independent of the 'Users can register applications' setting.

roles.name: Cloud application administrator
roles.description: Can create and manage all aspects of app registrations and enterprise apps except App Proxy.

roles.name: External identity provider administrator
roles.description: Can configure identity providers for use in direct federation.

roles.name: Guest inviter
roles.description: Can invite guest users independent of the 'members can invite guests' setting.

roles.name: Hybrid identity administrator
roles.description: Can manage AD to Azure AD cloud sync and federation settings.

roles.name: B2C IEF keyset administrator
roles.description: Can manage secrets for federation and encryption in the Identity Experience Framework (IEF).

roles.name: B2C IEF policy administrator
roles.description: Can create and manage trust framework policies in the Identity Experience Framework (IEF).

roles.name: Billing administrator
roles.description: Can perform common billing related tasks like updating payment information.

roles.name: Service support administrator
roles.description: Can read service health information and manage support tickets.

roles.name: Directory synchronization accounts
roles.description: Only used by Azure AD Connect service.

roles.name: Directory writers
roles.description: Can read and write basic directory information. For granting access to applications, not intended for users.

roles.name: Domain name administrator
roles.description: Can manage domain names in cloud and on-premises.

roles.name: Directory readers
roles.description: Can read basic directory information. Commonly used to grant directory read access to applications and guests.

roles.name: Security reader
roles.description: Can read security information and reports in Azure AD and Office 365.

roles.name: Global reader
roles.description: Can read everything that a global administrator can, but not update anything.

roles.name: Message center privacy reader
roles.description: Can read Message Center posts, data privacy messages, groups, domains and subscriptions.

roles.name: Message center reader
roles.description: Can read messages and updates for their organization in Office 365 Message Center only.

roles.name: Reports reader
roles.description: Can read sign-in and audit reports.

roles.name: Usage summary reports reader
roles.description: Can see only tenant level aggregates in M365 Usage Analytics and Productivity Score.

roles.name: Compliance administrator
roles.description: Can read and manage compliance configuration and reports in Azure AD and Office 365.

roles.name: Compliance data administrator
roles.description: Can create and manage compliance content.

roles.name: Security administrator
roles.description: Can read security information and reports, and manage configuration in Azure AD and Office 365.

roles.name: Security operator
roles.description: Can create and manage security events.

roles.name: Azure information protection administrator
roles.description: Can manage all aspects of the Azure Information Protection product.

roles.name: Customer Lockbox access approver
roles.description: Can approve Microsoft support requests to access customer organizational data.

roles.name: Authentication policy administrator
roles.description: Can create and manage all aspects of authentication methods and password protection policies.

roles.name: Attack payload author
roles.description: Can create attack payloads that an administrator can initiate later.

roles.name: Attack simulation administrator
roles.description: Can create and manage all aspects of attack simulation campaigns.
